paper_title.ja: テニスの筋疲労と筋痙攣に関する一考察
paper_title.en: A study on the relationship between muscle cramp and muscle fatigue in tennis

description.ja: To throw some light on the relationship between the muscle cramp and muscle fatigue/muscle strength, three types of measurement of muscle strength, which were contractions of isokinetic-concentric, isokinetic-eccentric and isometric, were measured before and after the load exercise with the muscle of quadriceps, at which portion the muscle cramps break out usually and frequently during tennis competition. The following results have been obtained. 1) The reducing rate of the isokinetic-eccentric contraction strength at fatigue is largest among three types of strength and the deference was 233.7(N) (n : 6, s.d. : 94.5) and of significance (p<0.01). 2) On the difference of the reducing ratio with the fatigue between the isokinetic-concentric muscle contraction strength and the isokinetic-eccentric muscle contraction strength, the eccentrics reduced at 13.2(%)(n : 6, s.d. 9.68) of significance (p<0.05) and was larger than the concentric contraction. Developing upper results and considering that the eventual characteristic of tennis plays like a lot of repeated and continuous explosive dash-and-stop and dash toward reverse or other directions would cause the muscles of quadriceps and gastrocnemius for an overload of eccentric contraction which is most influenced by the fatigue, it can be mentioned that tennis has a lot of characteristic and inevitable load to the muscles of quadriceps and gastrocnemius, and more, it can be pointed out a certain cause that the eccentric muscle contraction is easily and greatly influenced by the continuous and explosive exercise leading to the fatigue and to the muscle cramp of quadriceps and gastrocnemius of some tennis players. Therefore both of the muscle strength and endurance training to the high frequency portion of muscle cramp will prevent from the muscle cramp. And in the present study, a few pieces of information are suggested on the relationship between the fast twitch muscle and the cramp.
description.en: To throw some light on the relationship between the muscle cramp and muscle fatigue/muscle strength, three types of measurement of muscle strength, which were contractions of isokinetic-concentric, isokinetic-eccentric and isometric, were measured before and after the load exercise with the muscle of quadriceps, at which portion the muscle cramps break out usually and frequently during tennis competition. The following results have been obtained. 1) The reducing rate of the isokinetic-eccentric contraction strength at fatigue is largest among three types of strength and the deference was 233.7(N) (n : 6, s.d. : 94.5) and of significance (p<0.01). 2) On the difference of the reducing ratio with the fatigue between the isokinetic-concentric muscle contraction strength and the isokinetic-eccentric muscle contraction strength, the eccentrics reduced at 13.2(%)(n : 6, s.d. 9.68) of significance (p<0.05) and was larger than the concentric contraction. Developing upper results and considering that the eventual characteristic of tennis plays like a lot of repeated and continuous explosive dash-and-stop and dash toward reverse or other directions would cause the muscles of quadriceps and gastrocnemius for an overload of eccentric contraction which is most influenced by the fatigue, it can be mentioned that tennis has a lot of characteristic and inevitable load to the muscles of quadriceps and gastrocnemius, and more, it can be pointed out a certain cause that the eccentric muscle contraction is easily and greatly influenced by the continuous and explosive exercise leading to the fatigue and to the muscle cramp of quadriceps and gastrocnemius of some tennis players. Therefore both of the muscle strength and endurance training to the high frequency portion of muscle cramp will prevent from the muscle cramp. And in the present study, a few pieces of information are suggested on the relationship between the fast twitch muscle and the cramp.

paper_title.ja: 男子プロテニス選手におけるサーヴィス速度変化の戦術的効果に関する一考察
paper_title.en: Consideration upon the Tactical Effect of Change of Servive Speed in Male Profesional Tennis Players

description.ja: According as the rally tempo is accelerated remarkablely in recent tennis the service stroke that carrys out a preemptive oppotunity to attack takes on acqire importance more than ever. The tactics on a conbination of the service in tennis consisites of two factors controling the ball that are the speed (pace) and the course (placement or direction) in order to attack and make the open court (space). The present study was designed to investigate the actual conditions of a conbination on the service speed by the male professional tennis players and to throw some light on the tactical effect of a conbination of the service speed. The service speed indicated with the apparatus set up in a corner of the court was taken note. The service speed of the all points for 6 to 9 consecutive service games by six players in three singles matches was recorded. The numerical value of service speed indicated the initial speed. Those three matches were played at the first and second round in Australia Open taken place in 2001. The courts of these three games were the center court (Rod Laver Arena) and the first court (Vodafone Arena). The numbers 8 (ATP ranking is 23 rd.), 9. (ditto 2 nd.) and 28 (ditto 6 th.) seed players were included in these three matches. The investigations yielded the following results. a) There is a significant correlationsip between the first service speed and the height of the players. b) Winners' ratio for gaining point started from the first service ratio are higher than losers. c) The maximum or mean first service speed of winners was rapider than one of lossers. d) The number 28 (ATP ranking is 6 th.)seed player (G. Rusedoski : GBR) who had a rapid first service of prominence among the players participating in the championships did not make frequent use of high speed first services, and made freely use of slow speed first services. e) The player who competed with the number 28 seed player also had high speed first services, maximum and mean speed of his firstservice were respectively 214 (km/h) and 192. 7 (km/h), he made however few use of slow first service, so that his services showed no combination and monotony of first services f) The number 8 seed and 23 rd. ATP ranking player (P. Sampras) had the rapidest mean 2 nd. service speed of significance and the amplitude of speed was also largest. g) A decline in successful ratio of first service developed a tendency to lead the game of confusion, strain and loss. h) There was no common trend in the first service speed of all six players under any point situations. Three players that had the high speed service showed however respective peculiarities of significance under some point situations. From these results mentioned above, following tactical knowledges were noted. As the point percentage from the first service is ordinarily higher than from the 2 nd. service, it is important to raise the ratio of first service for average players in first service speed, and especialy for smaller players. And it is more effectual to use a change-up first service and to make a show of the combination with various service speeds in oder to keep the service game for the players who can hit even high speed first services over 200 (km/h).

The tactics on a conbination of the service in tennis consisites of two factors controling the ball that are the speed (pace) and the course (placement or direction) in order to attack and make the open court (space). The present study was designed to investigate the actual conditions of a conbination on the service speed by the male professional tennis players and to throw some light on the tactical effect of a conbination of the service speed. (ditto 2 nd.) and 28 (ditto 6 th.) seed players were included in these three matches. Rusedoski : GBR) who had a rapid first service of prominence among the players participating in the championships did not make frequent use of high speed first services, and made freely use of slow speed first services. e) The player who competed with the number 28 seed player also had high speed first services, maximum and mean speed of his firstservice were respectively 214 (km/h) and 192. 7 (km/h), he made however few use of slow first service, so that his services showed no combination and monotony of first services f) The number 8 seed and 23 rd. ATP ranking player (P. Sampras) had the rapidest mean 2 nd. service speed of significance and the amplitude of speed was also largest. g) A decline in successful ratio of first service developed a tendency to lead the game of confusion, strain and loss. h) There was no common trend in the first service speed of all six players under any point situations. Three players that had the high speed service showed however respective peculiarities of significance under some point situations. From these results mentioned above, following tactical knowledges were noted. As the point percentage from the first service is ordinarily higher than from the 2 nd. service, it is important to raise the ratio of first service for average players in first service speed, and especialy for smaller players. And it is more effectual to use a change-up first service and to make a show of the combination with various service speeds in oder to keep the service game for the players who can hit even high speed first services over 200 (km/h).

paper_title.ja: 球技スポーツ戦術の一般化及び統一理論
paper_title.en: A New Theory to Generalize and Unify the Tactics of Ball Games

description.ja: The present monograph sets forth that it is possible to construct a new unified theory on the tactics well adapted to all of ball games, with developing a theory resting upon the following two concepts that support offense and defense in ball game sports. 1) 「Utilizing and making the open space」 (offense) 2) 「Eliminating the open space or making the open space of no use」 (defense) And the key word 「open space」 in this unified tactics - theory for ball games is not confirmed to only an areal space but classified into some conceptions as follows. 1) Spatial Open Space 2) Temporal Open Space 3) Mental Open Space 4) Physical Open Space 5) Technical Open Space 6) Environmental Open Space 7) Others Furthermore, according to the above classified open spaces, the unified (general) tactics-theory for ball games is discussed at length in tennis, and is also mentioned an expanded example in the concrete in basket ball, volleyball and soccer respectively in the present paper.
description.en: The present monograph sets forth that it is possible to construct a new unified theory on the tactics well adapted to all of ball games, with developing a theory resting upon the following two concepts that support offense and defense in ball game sports. 1) 「Utilizing and making the open space」 (offense) 2) 「Eliminating the open space or making the open space of no use」 (defense) And the key word 「open space」 in this unified tactics - theory for ball games is not confirmed to only an areal space but classified into some conceptions as follows. 1) Spatial Open Space 2) Temporal Open Space 3) Mental Open Space 4) Physical Open Space 5) Technical Open Space 6) Environmental Open Space 7) Others Furthermore, according to the above classified open spaces, the unified (general) tactics-theory for ball games is discussed at length in tennis, and is also mentioned an expanded example in the concrete in basket ball, volleyball and soccer respectively in the present paper.

research_project_title.ja: 大学のテニス授業におけるテニスセンサー使用に関する有効性の検討
research_project_title.en: Effectiveness of using the tennis sensor in university physical education tennis class

offer_organization.en: Japan Society for the Promotion of Science

description.ja:
大学テニス授業において、テニスセンサーを装着したラケットで受講させた学生に対し、毎時間簡単な実技テスト、および授業最終日にアンケート調査を行った。
その結果、「ライブモードビデオ」により受講者自身のスマートフォンを用いて実技テストを撮影させたところ、打球データのみのフィードバックに比べ、よりわかりやすいとの評価を得た。
以上のことから、「ライブモードビデオ」により映像と打球データを同時に、かついつでも見ることのできる環境を受講者に与えることにより、大学テニス授業におけるセンサー使用の有効性が高くなることが証明された。
description.en:
The present study aimed to clarify effectiveness of using the tennis sensor in university physical education tennis class, A student of this class used a tennis racket attached the tennis sensor. After a class, they took a practical skill test, and download their hitting data to their smartphone.After the last class, they answered a questionnaire about using tennis sensor.
As a result, a good evaluation by the student was found by using "live mode video". It was found from result that by using "live mode video", the effectiveness of the tennis sensor use became higher by giving a student the environment that could check a video and their hitting data at the same time and anytime.
